name: OR_CASE_RSN_PRI_INAD_PROC
description: Contains the reason why a prior procedure was inadequate and why this case is being requested.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.description: Reason why a prior procedure was inadequate and why this case is being requested.
